comment.text: This translation key is used to display the minimum length requirement for a password. It provides users with information about the expected length of a strong password in various UI contexts, such as login and password change forms. The exact value displayed may vary depending on the password settings configuration.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "最小の長さ" (Saisho no Nagasa) literally translates to 'smallest length' or 'minimum length'. While it conveys a similar concept, "最小の長さ" isn't the most natural or common way to express 'minimum length' in Japanese in this context. A more idiomatic and appropriate translation would be "パスワードの最小文字数" (Pasuwa-do no Saisho Muji-sū) or "パスワードの最小限の文字数" (Pasuwa-do no Saisho-gen no Muji-sū). The existing translation is technically correct but lacks fluency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: パスワードの最小文字数 (Pasuwa-do no Saisho Muji-sū) or パスワードの最小限の文字数 (Pasuwa-do no Saisho-gen no Muji-sū)
